usage: Gym workout, total toning and strengthening
key_features: Give your body the total toning and strengthening workout
ai_description: This is a bright yellow kettlebell with a contrasting black handle, creating a bold and highly visible fitness product. The kettlebell has a classic spherical shape with a thick, sturdy handle designed for a secure grip. The brand name 'KAKSS' and the weight '8 KG' are clearly printed in white lettering on the front of the yellow body. The surface appears to have a durable neoprene coating on the main body while the handle remains uncoated metal, giving it a half-coated appearance. The product looks new and ready for use.
